404.message_html: We can't find the page you are looking for. Please try {{ search_link }} or viewing {{ collection_link }}.

contact.success: Thanks for the message. We'll be in touch soon!

search.search_results_empty: Sorry, searching for '{{ search_terms }}' returned 0 results

article_item.comment_pending: Your comment has been submitted but needs to be approved by the store before posting.
article_item.comment_success: Your comment bas been successfully posted! Refresh the page to see it.

general.empty_html: You don't have any items in your cart yet. {{ continue_link }}.
general.item_removed_message: {{ item_title }} has be removed from your cart.

shipping_calculator.prompt: Please enter your details to calculate shipping.
shipping_calculator.rates_html: There are {{ number_of_rates }} shipping rates available for {{ address }}, starting at {{ rate }}.
shipping_calculator.rate: There is one shipping rate available for {{ address }}.
shipping_calculator.no_rates: We do not ship to this destination.

account.no_addresses_html: You don't have any addresses saved to your account. Speed up your checkout process by adding a {{ new_address_link }}.
account.empty: You haven't placed any orders yet.

activate_account.message: To activate your account, choose a password and enter it below.

guest_checkout.message: Checkout as guest. No login required.

login.message: We've sent you an email containing a password reset link. If you remember your password before you receive our email, feel free to log in below:
login.recover_password_message: We'll send you an email to reset your password.

new_customer.message: Sign up for an account to take advantage of order tracking and history as well as pre-filled forms during checkout on subsequent orders.

reset_password.message: Enter a new password for {{ user }}:
reset_password.error: There was an error resetting your password, please try again.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

slideshow.title: This is your slideshow!
slideshow.subtitle: Head over to your settings page to start setting it up.

featured_collections.title: Featured collections
featured_collections.subtitle: You have not yet set up this section. Head to your theme settings to get started.
